thread.section_title: Park International Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay
thread.title_full: Lovely stay - Review of Park International Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: bernib33
title: Lovely stay
text:
This hotel was absolutely perfect the room was very clean and the staff were very professional and helpful. great location for all the museums, the underground was close by very handy for the Royal Albert hall which we were attending a event was a 10minutes walk away.
Good restaurant we enjoyed the meal, and will be booking this little treasure of Kensington again on our next visit to London
